subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The double-amputee sprinter Oscar Pistorius, who wants to race in the Olympics, will work with track and field’s world governing body to ensure that he does not have an unfair advantage.
snippet: The double-amputee sprinter Oscar Pistorius, who wants to race in the Olympics, will work with track and field’s world governing body to ensure that he does not have an unfair advantage.
